name: Crayon Shin-chan: Taiketsu! Quantum Panic!!
description: Based on the anime Crayon Shin-chan, Crayon Shin-chan: Taiketsu! Quantum Panic!! is made up of eleven mini-games including Worm Racing, Ball Catching, Freestyle Paddling, Balloon Pumping, Target Shooting, Beach Battle (Inspired by the Battleship board game), Maze Tagging, Number Bowling, Snowball Fighting, Music Matching and Robo Boxing. The mini-games can be played progressively in story mode or freely at the player's choice in practice mode.
